Methods.method_description:
Create a new DatatypeConfigurationException with
 no specified detail message and cause.

Create a new DatatypeConfigurationException with
 the specified detail message.

params.param_description: The cause.  A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.

Methods.method_description:
Create a new DatatypeConfigurationException with
 the specified detail message and cause.

params.param_description: The cause.  A null value is permitted, and indicates that the cause is nonexistent or unknown.

Methods.method_description:
Create a new DatatypeConfigurationException with
 the specified cause.

Print the the trace of methods from where the error
 originated.  This will trace all nested exception
 objects, as well as this object.

params.param_description: The writer where the dump will be sent to.

Methods.method_description:
Print the the trace of methods from where the error
 originated.  This will trace all nested exception
 objects, as well as this object.

params.param_description: The stream where the dump will be sent to.

Methods.method_description:
Print the the trace of methods from where the error
 originated.  This will trace all nested exception
 objects, as well as this object.
